name: SongBlastbyBeatTheIntro
0:
”Alexa, play song blast”
”Alexa open song blast”
”Alexa launch song blast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: song blast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Can you name that tune?
We’ve hand picked the best songs and created more than 30 catchy playlists, compete against a player with the same music taste in a match featuring five hit songs, can you top this months leaderboard?

⭐Song Blast Ultimate⭐
You can subscribe for unlimited access to all of the songs in all of our playlists including Today’s Top Hits.

You can link your account in the Amazon Alexa app to get email notifications of new updates and features!

To play just say: “Alexa, open Song Blast!”

Any questions or suggestions? Drop a message to: play@yakyakgames.com
